error_message_1.name: Error Message 1
error_message_1.description:
Error message 1.
Codes:
0: Fan is locked when inverter is off
1: Inverter transformer over temperature
2: Battery voltage is too high
3: Battery voltage is too low
4: Output short circuited
5: Inverter output voltage is high
6: Overload time out
7: Inverter bus voltage is too high
8: Bus soft start failed
9: Main relay failed
10: Inverter output voltage sensor error
11: Inverter grid voltage sensor error
12: Inverter output current sensor error
13: Inverter grid current sensor error
14: Inverter load current sensor error
15: Inverter grid over current error

error_message_2.name: Error Message 2
error_message_2.description:
Error message 2.
Codes:
0: Inverter radiator over temperature
1: Solar charger battery voltage class error
2: Solar charger current sensor error
3: Solar charger current is uncontrollable
4: Inverter grid voltage is low
5: Inverter grid voltage is high
6: Inverter grid under frequency
7: Inverter grid over frequency
8: Inverter over current protection error
9: Inverter bus voltage is too low
10: Inverter soft start failed
11: Over DC voltage in AC output
12: Battery connection is open
13: Inverter control current sensor error
14: Inverter output voltage is too low

warning_message_1.name: Warning Message 1
warning_message_1.description:
Warning message 1.
Codes:
0: Fan is locked when inverter is on
1: Fan 2 is locked when inverter is on
2: Battery is over-charged
3: Low battery
4: Inverter overload
5: Output power derating
6: Solar charger stopped due to low battery
7: Solar charger stopped due to high PV voltage
8: Solar charger stopped due to over load
9: Solar charger stopped due to over temperature
10: PV charger stopped due to communication error

charger_error_message.name: Charger Error Message
charger_error_message.description:
Charger error message.
Codes:
0: Hardware protection
1: Over current
2: Current sensor error
3: Over temperature
4: PV voltage is too high
5: PV voltage is too low
6: Battery voltage is too high
7: Battery voltage is too low
8: Current is uncontrollable
9: Parameter error.

charger_errors.4: PV voltage is too high in charger.
charger_errors.5: PC voltage is too low in charger.
charger_errors.6: Battery voltage is too high in charger.
charger_errors.7: Battery voltage is too low in charger.

inverter_errors1.0: Fan locked when inverter is off.
inverter_errors1.2: Battery voltage is too high for inverter.
inverter_errors1.3: Battery voltage is too low for inverter.
inverter_errors1.4: Output short circuit detected in inverter.
inverter_errors1.5: Inverter output voltage is too high.
inverter_errors1.6: Inverter was overloaded for too long, overload timeout!
inverter_errors1.7: Inverter bus voltage is too high.
inverter_errors1.8: Bus soft start failed in inverter.

inverter_errors2.1: Solar charger battery voltage class error.
inverter_errors2.4: Inverter grid voltage is too low.
inverter_errors2.5: Inverter grid voltage is too high.
inverter_errors2.6: Inverter grid is on too low frequency.
inverter_errors2.7: Inverter grid is on too high frequency
inverter_errors2.9: Inverter bus voltage is too low.
inverter_errors2.11: Over DC voltage in AC output!
inverter_errors2.14: Inverter output voltage is too low.

inverter_warnings1.0: Fan is locked when inverter is on.
inverter_warnings1.1: Fan 2 is locked when inverter is on.
inverter_warnings1.6: Solar charger stopped due to low battery.
inverter_warnings1.7: Solar charger stopped due to high PV voltage.
inverter_warnings1.8: Solar charger stopped due to over load.
inverter_warnings1.9: Solar charger stopped due to over temperature.
inverter_warnings1.10: PV charger stopped due to communication error.
